medium: Ink, colors, and gold  leaf on paper
title: Old Plum Branch
description: four panels; scene of branches with white and red flowers; gold background
creditline: Lent by The Metropolitan Museum of Art, The Harry G. C. Packard Collection of Asian Art, Gift of Harry G. C. Packard, and Purchase, Fletcher, Rogers, Harris Brisbane Dick, and Louis V. Bell Funds, Joseph Pulitzer Bequest, and The Annenberg Fund Inc. Gift, 1975
